author: VNExplorer
title: As√≠ defendi√≥ el l√≠der sindical del Infonavit el retiro y destrucci√≥n de bandera LGBT+
text: As√≠ defendi√≥ el l√≠der sindical del Infonavit el retiro y destrucci√≥n de bandera LGBT+ CIUDAD DE M√âXICO (apro).- El l√≠der del Sindicato del Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda para los Trabajadores (Infonavit), Rafael Riva Palacio Pontones, justific√≥ el retiro y destrucci√≥n de la bandera arco√≠ris representativa de la comunidad LGBT+ colocada en la fachada del edificio. El pasado martes, el director de la instituci√≥n, Carlos Mart√≠nez Vel√°zquez, public√≥ im√°genes del momento en el que varios individuos tratan de arrancar la bandera multicolor del edificio institucional. Mart√≠nez Vel√°zquez comparti√≥ un video en el que se escucha a Riva Palacio pontones expresarse sobre la bandera: ‚ÄúEsto que est√°n haciendo, me parece que es indigno‚Äù, declar√≥ se√±alando la bandera. ‚ÄúCuantas veces lo quieran poner, tantas veces como lo pongan lo vamos a quitar‚Äù, advirti√≥ Riva Palacio por medio de un meg√°fono. ‚ÄúS√© que a muchas trabajadoras y a muchos trabajadores los est√°n amedrentando, le est√°n pisando su dignidad y se prestigio‚Äù, agreg√≥. Tras la denuncia del director, el l√≠der sindical emiti√≥ un comunicado en el que defendi√≥ su actuar y el de sus agremiados. Argument√≥ que de acuerdo con la Ley del Instituto, bajo la Fracci√≥n IV del art√≠culo 5, el patrimonio del mismo es propiedad de las y los trabajadores. "La fachada del edificio como se dijo es PATRIMONIO DEL INFONAVIT y no se justifica el hacer uso de √©l para un fin publicitario, al haber colocado pendones en raz√≥n de la conmemoraci√≥n del orgullo LGBTTTIQ+", apunt√≥. Y aunque dijo ser respetuoso de la comunidad LGBT+, recalc√≥ que est√° en su derecho de mostrar su inconformidad. "He sido y, seguir√© siendo respetuoso y emp√°tico con todas las trabajadoras y con todos los trabajadores del INFONAVIT sin importar su orientaci√≥n; por lo que lamento profundamente el haber lastimado la sensibilidad de quienes se sintieron ofendidos sin haber sido este el prop√≥sito de mis acciones", resalt√≥. Finalmente, el l√≠der sindical reiter√≥ su compromiso de "promover, respetar, proteger y garantizar la seguridad y los derechos humanos de los trabajadores derechohabientes del Instituto, as√≠ como de la comunidad LGBTTTIQ+‚Äù.

author: di Massimo Calandri
title: MotoGp, cancellato il Gp di Valencia - la Repubblica
text:
Non si correr√† a Valencia . L‚Äôultimo e probabilmente decisivo gp della stagione del motomondiale, ufficialmente in programma nella citt√† spagnola dal 15 al 17 novembre, √® stato cancellato a causa delle drammatiche inondazioni . La notizia √® stata comunicata in maniera informale ma definitiva ai piloti durante la safety commission che si √® tenuta nl paddock di Sepang al termine della prima giornata di prove libere del gran premio di Malesia . ‚ÄúNon correremo a Valencia, ma per Valencia‚Äù, hanno detto gli organizzatori della Dorna. "Dopo aver valutato con attenzione il possibile impatto positivo di una gara della MotoGp da disputare a Valencia in date posticipate, tenendo conto dell'esigenza di garantire che nessuna risorsa venisse sottratta dalla presenza della MotoGp agli sforzi necessari per il recupero, il campionato e le autorit√† locali sono stati costretti a cancellare il GP di Valencia del 2024".
2024 #ValenciaGP will not go ahead, replacement to be confirmed https://t.co/HjIvxEt6ad
‚Äî MotoGP‚Ñ¢ (@MotoGP) November 1, 2024
Possibile il posticipo di una settimana A questo punto √® molto probabile che la gara venga comunque posticipata di una settimana, e cio√® al week-end del 22-24 novembre: dove? Probabilmente a Barcellona , sulla pista del Montmel√≤. L‚Äôalternativa √® Losail , in Qatar, ma anche altri due circuiti spagnoli (Jerez de la Frontera, Alcaniz in Aragona) e quello portoghese di Portimao . Si dovranno fare i conti con le condizioni meteo e la necessit√† di organizzare subito, nei due giorni immediatamente successivi al gp, i primi test della stagione 2025.
MotoGp, Bagnaia: ‚ÄúA Valencia non corro, a costo di perdere il mondiale‚Äù di Massimo Calandri 01 Novembre 2024

author: logo
title: Flight Services Disrupted Due To Heavy Downpour In Bengaluru
text: Heavy overnight rain disrupted flight services in Bengaluru, officials at the Kempegowda International Airport said on Friday. Several flights including international passenger flights were diverted, they said. "Heavy rainfall accompanied by strong winds rendered the airport inaccessible for landing between 9.35 pm and 10.29 pm, leading to diversion of flights," a BIAL official said in a statement. He said 13 domestic flights, three international passenger flights, and one international cargo flight were diverted to Chennai on Thursday. The rain coupled with strong winds brought down many trees in several parts of the city including, Jayanagar, Nrupathunga Nagar and RR Nagar. Advertisement The rains also brought relief to the Bengaluru residents from the blistering summer heat, which they had not witnessed for many decades. The city has been receiving rain for the past four days. According to the India Meteorological Department, Bengaluru city received 14 mm rain in the 24-hour period till 8.30 am on Friday. It said in a statement the maximum and minimum temperature of the city stood at 33 and 22 degrees Celsius respectively in the last 24 hours.

author: Marley Dickinson
title: Irish Olympian breaks women‚Äôs parkrun world record
text:
Irish Olympian breaks women‚Äôs parkrun world record
Ciara Mageean ran a speedy 15:13 in Belfast to take 12 seconds off the previous parkrun recordPhoto by: Kevin Morris
With December and January being down months for competition and racing, some distance runners need a place to test their fitness. On Dec. 23, Irish Olympian
Ciara Mageean put her training to the test at Victoria Park parkrun in Belfast, setting a new women‚Äôs parkrun world record of 15:13.
An astonishing run from Ciara Mageean as she becomes the fastest female park runner in history üî•
The multiple major middle distance running medallist clocked an amazing 15:13 at Belfast Victoria üí•
üì∏
[@EDAC_Youtube] [pic.twitter.com/wDQMlAquwc]
‚Äî AW (@AthleticsWeekly)
[December 23, 2023]
The 31-year-old, who finished fourth in the women‚Äôs 1,500m at the 2023 World Athletics Championships in Budapest, ran the timed 5K course 12 seconds faster than the previous record holder, Australia‚Äôs
Izzi Batt-Doyle.
Batt-Doyle ran 15:25 to set the record at the Aldinga Beach parkrun, just outside her hometown of Adelaide, Australia, in December 2022.
Parkrun is a weekly, free, community-based timed 5K where you can run, jog and/or walk in parks and open spaces around the world. Every parkrun event is 5K and is held on Saturday morning.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a nice way to start the Christmas period,‚Äù Mageean said about her
new record to Athletics Weekly. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a big one with the Olympics coming up in the summer and World Indoors and European Champs too in the run-up to it. I‚Äôve had a good winter (training) block too with solid work, so it‚Äôs good to come out and run a good 5K here.‚Äù
Her 5K parkrun record caps off an impressive breakout season for Mageean, who broke Irish national records in the 800m, 1,500m and mile on her way to her fourth-place finish at Worlds in August.
The concept of parkrun began in London‚Äôs Bushy Park in 2004, with the aim to create an inclusive and community-focused event that encouraged people of all ages and fitness levels to participate in a timed 5K run or walk. It remains one of the most popular weekly run groups across the world.
If you are interested in checking out or volunteering at a local parkrun, you can find your nearest parkrun
here.
